metadata.title: Sold My Soul to Rock & Roll Long Sleeve T-Shirt Demon Guitar Wings Trident Tee
features: GREAT FIT: This long sleeve t-shirt feels great and fits true to size. Sold My Soul To Rock & Roll crewneck shirt for men is a perfect gift. A tee is a great present for dad, husband, son, boyfriend, grandpa, mom, wife, daughter or grandma .Please check our store for a funny, Christmas, humor, pop culture, sarcastic, men's novelty t-shirt, women's novelty t-shirt, or clothing that makes a statement. We have lots of designs and grahic shirts.

TOP QUALITY: We have a wide selection of apparel and gift ideas for men, women, and kids including shirts, tank tops, hooded sweatshirts, and more. Find something for everyone in your family. Our graphic t-shirts are printed and designed in the USA by our amazing team of professionals. Our Pennsylvania printing facility has one of the best screen printing and Direct-to-Garment printing equipment to ensure the best quality possible. Our tees are available in lots of sizes and colors.

AWESOME FEEL: We offer long sleeve t-shirts that are 100% US Cotton. Heather Grey 90% US cotton, 10% polyester. These tees are a modern fit. We offer sizes up to 2XL and 3XL. We have lots of men's shirts women's shirts, kid's shirts, shortsleeve, longsleeve and hoodies, and sweatshirts to choose from, for the whole family, including an uncle, aunt, or best friend. Features: double-needle topstitched collar, taped neck, and shoulders, double-needle bottom hem, rib cuffs.

HAVE FUN: Our cool shirts are made to add some fun with lots of t-shirt prints to choose from. Be the center of attention at a birthday, Christmas party, or when you are around your friends and family. Funny tees or sarcastic novelty tshirts are great to break the ice. Our shirts are comfortable and great quality t-shirts you can wear to work or at home. An awesome shirt is the best Xmas Christmas gift, birthday gift, Father's Day gift, Mother's Day gift, graduation gift, back to school gift.

SUSTAINABILITY: Our cotton t shirts are made with sustainability in mind. Cotton is sustainably grown and ethically harvested. 100% of fabric cutting scraps are recycled into fiber and used in new products. 33% of the energy used to manufacture these tee shirts comes from renewable resources. Washing your tee inside out in cold water not only makes your tee last longer but also is good for the Earth, about 90% of the energy used by the washing machine goes towards heating the water.
description: SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: What you wear is important to you and it instantly tells something about you to the others. Express yourself with this awesome sweatshirt. Inspire, make people laugh or send a message. This sweatshirt is great for everyday use, whether you are going to a training session or to a party, want to go outdoors or just stay home, watch TV and chill. It has a comfortable fit and pleasant feel to it.ABOUT TEE HUNT: We are a proud American company, operating in Warminster, Pennsylvania. All of our products are printed in the USA. If you place an order right now we will ship it within a business day. At Tee Hunt we have a huge assortment of apparel; novelty shirts for men, womens graphic tees, t shirts for women and kids will be great addition to any wardrobe. You can find hoodies, women shirts, sweatshirts, tank tops, mens shirts, graphic tees, muscle shirts, and outfits for any occasion: Birthday, Christmas, Independence Day, St. Patrick's Day, Father's Day and Mother's Day, Cinco de Mayo, Halloween or Easter. We are constantly following the popular culture and doing our best to reflect the current trends by introducing new prints to our stock. We are using a variety of different methods to create our products: heat transfer, screen printing and the advanced "direct-to-garment" printing technology. Check out our store - you will be able to find your perfect tee.
